name: Marslag
description:
Marslag is a game which you're controlling a rover on Mars with a huge time lag. You're entering movements before the satellite connection break. When the connection break, your saved actions execute. The Game increasingly gets harder as you progress.

The game is made without using a word or a number. So if you're stuck at something, feel free to ask it in comments below.

Controls (Only look if you have to):

  • WASD or Arrow keys to save movement in that direction
  • Enter or Space to execute
  • Escape or delete to remove last movement
  • Hold ESC to quit

This game is made for #zerowordsgamejam.
